entry.title: Pandemic-Era Border Policy Expires Amid Migrant Surge
entry.content: Thousands of migrants crossed into the U.S. before midnight in anticipation of harsher immigration rules with the expiration of Title 42.

entry.title: Gaza Militants Fire Rockets Toward Jerusalem Area
entry.content: The rocket barrage set off air-raid sirens in Beitar Illit, an Israeli settlement in the occupied West Bank 10 miles south of the contested city.

entry.title: Ukraine Presses Counterattack Around Bakhmut
entry.content: The Ukrainian government said its troops had advanced on Russian forces on the Bakhmut front as Kyiv seeks to turn the tide around the embattled city after months on the defensive.

entry.title: In Israel, Army Service Is Required for All. That Could Now Change.
entry.content: A demand by ultra-Orthodox lawmakers to exempt their community from the draft is pushing the government to rethink what it requires of the nationâ€™s youth.
